name: Staffing 360 Solutions, Inc.
description: Staffing 360 Solutions, Inc. is a leading staffing and recruiting company focused on providing workforce solutions across various industries including finance, healthcare, and technology. Founded in 2013 and headquartered in New York City, the company has rapidly expanded its footprint, acquiring multiple staffing firms to enhance its service offerings and geographical reach. Staffing 360 Solutions offers a comprehensive range of staffing services, including temporary, permanent, and contract staffing. The company prides itself on its ability to match skilled candidates with the right job opportunities, leveraging advanced technology and a dedicated team of recruitment experts. Their commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has earned them a reputation as a trusted partner for both businesses seeking talent and job seekers looking for their next career opportunity. Additionally, Staffing 360 Solutions is committed to diversity and inclusion, actively promoting a diverse workforce that reflects the communities they serve. The company continuously invests in innovative staffing technologies and strategies, including the use of data analytics to improve the hiring process. As the labor market evolves, Staffing 360 Solutions remains agile and responsive to the changing needs of employers and job seekers alike.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
